snippet.title: Myanmar rebel leader urges US role in peace talks
snippet.description: A leader of ethnic Kachin rebels battling government forces in Myanmar has urged the U.S. to play a role in peace talks to quell decades of conflict in the country's lawless border regions.

snippet.title: Myanmar says 22 dead in Kachin fighting this month
snippet.description: Fighting between government troops and ethnic rebels in Myanmar's northeastern state of Kachin has left at least 22 people dead this month, state-run media reported Sunday.

snippet.title: British tourist's tattoo leads to Sri Lanka arrest
snippet.description: A British tourist falls afoul of Sri Lanka's religious nationalism

snippet.title: Probe urged over missing Thai environment activist
snippet.description: Relatives and human rights groups urged Thai authorities on Monday to investigate the disappearance of an environmental activist who has worked to help ethnic Karen villagers report illegal activity at Thailand's largest national park.

snippet.title: U.S. officials warn Burma that attacks on Rohingya Muslims, aid groups are hurting ties
snippet.description: American officials warn that attacks on Rohingya, foreign aid groups could undermine rapprochement.

snippet.title: Journalists charged with defaming Thailand's navy
snippet.description: Thai authorities on Thursday charged two journalists with defaming Thailand's navy in an online news report about the trafficking of refugees from Myanmar, amid concerns about press freedom in the country.

snippet.title: Photos of the day
snippet.description: "Forever Marilyn," tulip fields, salmon and sweetfish, La Paz's urban ropeway system and more.

snippet.title: Unspeakable violence against Muslims in Burma
snippet.description: Despite progress toward democracy, ethnic tension leads to rioting and death.

snippet.title: Samantha Power: learning to play the diplomat's game
snippet.description: As ambassador to the U.N., Samantha Power is learning to play the diplomat's game

snippet.title: NGOs targeted in Myanmar, causing food prices to soar
